featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse Flat Configurations and Residential Living Options in sector 89 Gurugram
description: sector 89 offers a comprehensive range of Flat For Sale options designed to meet the varying needs of modern homeowners and investors. From efficient, stylish apartments perfect for young professionals to expansive, family-friendly residences, the inventory here is vast and high-quality. We help you navigate the best available choices, ensuring you find a home that aligns perfectly with your lifestyle requirements and financial goals. All properties listed are verified for documentation and construction quality, providing peace of mind.

The residential projects in sector 89 focus heavily on providing a holistic living experience. Expect features such as 24/7 power backup, advanced security systems, dedicated parking, and access to community amenities like parks, swimming pools, and clubhouses. Understanding the specific benefits of each configuration is crucial for making an informed purchase decision. Below, we detail the most popular Flat For Sale configurations available in sector 89.

features.title: 1 BHK Flats for Budget Buyers
features.description: Ideal for singles, students, or young couples, the 1 BHK Flat For Sale in sector 89 provides an affordable entry point into the Gurugram real estate market. These units maximize space efficiency, offering comfortable living areas, a functional kitchen, and a private bedroom. They are highly sought after for rental income potential due to their lower maintenance costs and manageable size, representing a smart investment opportunity for capital growth in a fast-developing sector.

features.title: 2 BHK Flats Perfect for Small Families
features.description: The 2 BHK configurations are extremely popular in sector 89, striking the perfect balance between affordability and space. These flats cater well to small families, providing two bedrooms, a spacious living-dining area, and often two bathrooms. Projects here boast modern architecture and amenities, making 2 BHK properties a practical and comfortable choice. They are readily available in both high-rise societies and independent builder floors throughout sector 89 Gurugram.

features.title: 3 BHK Spacious Homes for Growing Families
features.description: For families requiring more space and luxury, the 3 BHK Flat For Sale options are the benchmark. These units typically feature larger floor plans, dedicated servant quarters in some premium projects, and superior finishes. Residents benefit from expansive balconies, ample natural light, and access to top-tier societal amenities like gymnasiums and sports facilities. Investing in a 3 BHK in sector 89 ensures a high-quality lifestyle in a well-connected locality of Gurugram.

Expect designer fittings, modular kitchens, large terraces, and panoramic views of the city or surrounding green areas. features.title: Ready to Move Flats for Immediate Occupancy

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a Flat For Sale in sector 89 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to common inquiries regarding property investment, documentation, and the residential environment in sector 89 Gurugram.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes for a 3 BHK Flat For Sale in sector 89 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The sizes for a 3 BHK flat in sector 89 typically range significantly based on the builder and the specific project. Generally, you can expect super areas to start from around 1350 square feet and go up to 2200 square feet for more luxurious or premium configurations. These sizes usually include balconies, common areas, and wall thicknesses. Always verify the carpet area and super area details in the RERA documentation for precise measurements before finalizing your purchase, ensuring the size meets your family needs.

faqs.question: Is sector 89 considered a good investment location for property appreciation
faqs.answer: Yes, sector 89 is widely regarded as a high-potential investment zone in Gurugram. Its location along the developing Greater Gurugram corridor, coupled with excellent infrastructure planning and proximity to the main Expressway, suggests strong future capital appreciation. The ongoing development of commercial hubs nearby and the entry of premium builders further solidify its status as a growth market. Investing in a Flat For Sale here now is advisable to realize maximum returns.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2 BHK Flat For Sale in sector 89
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 2 BHK Flat For Sale in sector 89 varies depending on factors such as the society's amenities, floor level, age of construction, and specific location within the sector. On average, a standard 2 BHK apartment can range from approximately 45 lakhs up to 75 lakhs. Premium builder floors or units with exceptional views or amenities might be priced higher. It is essential to consult with our local experts for the most current and specific pricing based on the latest market trends.

faqs.question: Are ready-to-move flats available in sector 89 and what are their benefits
faqs.answer: Yes, sector 89 has a substantial inventory of ready-to-move flats across various configurations (1BHK to 4BHK). The primary benefits of purchasing a ready-to-move property include immediate occupancy, eliminating the worry of construction delays, and saving on rent and EMI simultaneously. Furthermore, you can physically inspect the quality of construction and the flat’s actual size before making the full commitment, offering greater peace of mind compared to under-construction projects.

faqs.question: What are the security features offered in residential societies in sector 89
faqs.answer: Residential societies offering a Flat For Sale in sector 89 prioritize resident safety. Standard security features typically include 24/7 security personnel stationed at entry and exit points, CCTV surveillance across common areas, intercom facilities connecting flats to the main gate, and boom barriers. Many premium societies also incorporate digital visitor management systems and controlled access points for maximum security and resident privacy.

faqs.question: How is the water and electricity supply situation in sector 89 Gurugram
faqs.answer: sector 89, being a well-planned area of Greater Gurugram, generally enjoys a reliable supply of essential utilities. Projects are mandated to provide adequate water supply, often supplemented by internal water treatment plants and borewells. Regarding electricity, most societies offer 100% power backup for common areas and partial to full backup within individual flats, minimizing disruption during power outages, ensuring continuous comfort for residents.

faqs.question: What financing options are available for purchasing a Flat For Sale in sector 89
faqs.answer: Buyers in sector 89 have access to a wide array of financing options from leading public and private sector banks and non-banking financial companies (NBFCs). We can connect you with lenders offering competitive home loan interest rates, with loan-to-value (LTV) ratios typically up to 80% of the property value. Eligibility depends on your credit score and income proof. We assist in streamlining the documentation process for quick loan approval.

faqs.question: What is the mandatory RERA requirement when buying a flat in this sector
faqs.answer: Under the Real Estate Regulatory Authority (RERA) Act, all ongoing and newly launched residential projects in sector 89 must be registered with RERA. Buyers should always check for the project’s RERA registration number, which guarantees transparency, timely completion, and adherence to promised specifications. RERA provides legal protection and recourse in case of any developer discrepancies, making it a crucial check before property purchase.

faqs.question: Is sector 89 well-connected to public transport like the metro and bus services
faqs.answer: Yes, sector 89 benefits from its proximity to major transportation arteries. While the sector itself is relatively new, it is well-connected by local bus routes and auto services. Furthermore, the nearest Gurugram Metro stations are easily accessible by road, providing fast connectivity to the entire NCR region, including Delhi. The strategic location ensures that public and private transportation options are plentiful for daily commuting needs.

faqs.question: Can NRIs buy a Flat For Sale in sector 89 and what documents are needed
faqs.answer: Non-Resident Indians (NRIs) are legally permitted to purchase residential property like flats in sector 89. Required documents typically include passport copies, overseas address proofs, PAN card, and bank statements (NRE/NRO accounts). They must adhere to FEMA guidelines. We provide specialized legal and documentation support for NRI buyers, ensuring a compliant and efficient transaction process from inquiry to final registration.
